;一位心怀不满的将军在 ;;玻利维亚;;。与胡安·何塞·祖尼加将军结盟的部队袭击了首都拉巴斯的总统府，但随着势头减弱而撤退。一些玻利维亚人也走上街头谴责政变企图。总统路易斯·阿尔塞呼吁国际社会提供支持。祖尼加将军最近因表示将阻止前左翼总统埃沃·莫拉莱斯在明年的选举中再次竞选公职而被解雇。

;

;2014 年至 2022 年担任;洪都拉斯总统;的胡安·奥兰多·埃尔南德斯 (Juan Orlando Hernández) 因向美国运送可卡因而被曼哈顿法官判处 45 年监禁。埃尔南德斯收受了数百万美元的贿赂，他告诉朋友，他会将可卡因“直接塞进外国佬的鼻子里”。

;美联储发布了年度;压力测试;结果，评估银行如何应对全球经济严重衰退，房地产市场崩溃。包括美国银行、摩根大通和富国银行在内的所有 31 家银行都通过了美联储的基准情景，达到了最低资本比率，尽管作为损失缓冲的总资本比率从 12.7% 下降至 9.9%。该银行的假设损失合计达到 6850 亿美元。

;;汉莎航空;宣布将转嫁遵守规定的成本乘客的新排放法规。德国航空公司将于 12 月 31 日之后对从;欧盟、;英国、挪威和瑞士出发的航班征收 1 欧元至 72 欧元（77 美元）之间的“环境成本附加费”。汉莎航空表示，这是为了帮助遵守欧洲规定，确保航空公司至少 2% 的燃油消耗来自更昂贵的可持续航空燃油以及其他绿色环保措施。

;Elections to the ;;European Parliament;; saw the hard right making the most gains overall, though the European People's Party, representing the centre-right, and the Socialists and Democrats, on the centre-left, remain the biggest voting blocs. Green parties lost a quarter of their seats. In ;France; Marine Le Pen's right-wing National Rally took a third of the vote, more than double that of Emmanuel Macron's party, Renaissance. In a surprise announcement, the French president dissolved the National Assembly and called a snap election. Mr Macron lost his parliamentary majority in 2022, and says the country now “needs a clear majority in serenity and harmony”.

;

;;Germany's; governing coalition also got a shellacking at the election. The opposition Christian Democrats came first and the nationalist Alternative for Germany (;A;f;D;) second, beating all three parties in the government. The Social Democrats, the party of Chancellor Olaf Scholz, took just 14%, its worst showing ever in a national poll. The ;A;f;D';s biggest increase in support was among people aged 16-24, in an election where 16-year-olds were able to vote for the first time.

;;S;;ometimes during; big set pieces the news takes an unexpected and confounding turn. At first you regret how weeks of careful planning have gone awry. And then it dawns on you: a good story has just become a great one.

;

;An example is the re-election of Narendra Modi as prime minister of India this week. His coalition, led by the Bharatiya Janata Party (;BJP;), had targeted 400 seats in the lower house, not only an improvement on 2014 and 2019, but also enough to amend the constitution. Exit polls over the weekend, as northern and central India sweltered in a heatwave, suggested that Mr Modi might fall short, but not by much.
